Name: Zoning, Atlantic Avenue Mixed-Use Plan, Brooklyn (C 250017 HAK)
Title: Application number C 250017 HAK (Atlantic Avenue Mixed-Use Plan) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 516 Bergen Street (Block 1143, Lot 25) as an Urban Development Action Area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 8, Council District 35.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Attachments.Name: Calendar of the Zoning Subcommittee Meeting - March 27, 2025
